text: Leandro Fernández de Moratín (March 10, 1760, Madrid–June 21, 1828, Paris) was a Spanish dramatist, translator and neoclassical poet. He is the son of Nicolás Fernández de Moratín, who used to be a lawyer and a professor of poetry. ==References== Category:1760 births Category:1828 deaths Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish translators
title: Leandro de Moratín
